content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Resource Manager\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your main adviser and go-to from the very first day in EPAM is your Resource Manager (RM). This person engages you in his team (resource group), contributes to your professional and career development and is responsible for the quality of your work. You may contact your RM for any professional questions. Discuss the details of your adaptation process and development plans at the next 1x1 meeting (your RM should fix and appointment within the first week).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Apart from support and assistance in professional growth your RM will make decision on completion of your probation period, coordinate your assignments to projects, raise the salary, approve of training courses, vacations and tackle many other outstanding issues. In some resource groups (especially of sizable staff) there are internal rules and processes arranged by RM to effectively develop his team. So, learn from your RM about your unit activities he is planning to involve you in.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":245161,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c0b24e48-6afc-42c8-a590-7dc8bc110908/org str.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c0b24e48-6afc-42c8-a590-7dc8bc110908/org str.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"org str.PNG\",\"name\":\"org str.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c0b24e48-6afc-42c8-a590-7dc8bc110908\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":629.1491712707183},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"size\":149558,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/343e1302-b632-4232-b585-567a92adb2a3/Capture3.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/343e1302-b632-4232-b585-567a92adb2a3/Capture3.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture3.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture3.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"343e1302-b632-4232-b585-567a92adb2a3\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":353,\"height\":385},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"People Partner (HR Contact)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At the early stage of working at the company, HR helps employees become familiar with the main processes adopted by EPAM and within JS-practice. The HR team supports employees throughout all stages of work and creates favorable conditions for working and getting involved in the life of the department. If you have any questions, you can always contact your HR, ask for advice or suggestions. There are HR in every location, to see yours visit widget HR Contacts in \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://telescope.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Your primary HR is marked with a star. For example:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":18691,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f47bb282-a803-4760-8580-0bdc78b47d1d/Picture13.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f47bb282-a803-4760-8580-0bdc78b47d1d/Picture13.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture13.png\",\"name\":\"Picture13.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f47bb282-a803-4760-8580-0bdc78b47d1d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":429,\"height\":154},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
